_meanings:
A particle of 
interrogation or inquiry, often 
implying ‘doubt’, or ‘surprise’, and
translateable by ‘what’, ‘hey’.
‘hallo’, ‘can it be that’.
It is added to interrogative
pronouns in this sense or to give
an indefinite sense; {#kAsvidavaguMWanavatI#}
{#nAtiparisPuwaSarIralAvaRyA#} <ls>Ś. 5. 13</ls>;
<ls>Me. 14.</ls> It is sometimes used 
disjunctively in the sense of ‘either,’
‘or’, with {#nu, uta, vA#} &c.; see  
<ls>Ki. 8. 35</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">12. 15</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">13. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">14. 60</ls>; {#Aho#}
also.
